column1: Players are a group of explorers in a pyramid attempting to learn forbidden knowledge and find treasure.<br/><br/>However the pyramid has many traps and tricks, and lurking about is the Mummy who will not rest until all are dead.  Comes with a 3D three level gameboard that players have to ascend and metal miniatures.<br/><br/>Expanded by<br/>Curse of the Mummy's Tomb: In Search of Eternity<br/><br/><br/>Flavour text from the box:<br/><br/>&quo...
Ancient: Egypt, Components: 3-Dimensional (3D), Constructions: Pyramids, Country: Egypt, Creatures: Mummies, Occupation: Adventurer / Explorer, Theme: Archaeology / Paleontology
